name: Secrets of the Forest
description:
Secrets of the Forest is a pixel art fantasy puzzle platformer. Your aim as the player is to make your way through the levels of the game by completing puzzles, collecting gems and defeating the enemies blocking your path. Ensure that you use the space around you to your advantage, this game was designed to make you think, how can i get past this? Take your time and use your head!

Key Features: This quirky little game has a 8 bit pixel art style, it is full of bright colours and challenging puzzles that you will need to work through in order to complete each level. You will be able to complete puzzles, collect keys and gems, and shoot down your enemies. Unique levels become more challenging the further you go, and new things to help and harm you will be added along the way. You’ll be sure to keep your eye out for changes in each level!

Release date: 23/06/2022

Platform: PC
